meanings.definition: Able to be consumed or used up
meanings.sent1: The candy was consumable, so I ate it all in one sitting.
meanings.sent2: The consumable snacks were quickly devoured by the hungry children.
meanings.sent3: The consumable popcorn disappeared faster than a magician's trick!
meanings.sent4: Her patience was as consumable as a limited edition treat.
meanings.sent5: The consumable nature of the ice cream made it irresistible on a hot day.

meanings.definition: A product that is intended to be used up or depleted, such as food or fuel.
meanings.sent1: The store stocked various consumables like bread and milk.
meanings.sent2: The consumable in the emergency kit included water and energy bars.
meanings.sent3: The party's consumable supply dwindled as the night went on.
meanings.sent4: His love was a consumable, always giving and never expecting in return.
meanings.sent5: The consumable fuel kept the car running smoothly on the long journey.
